purpose: To provide an integrated platform for leveraging Transformer models in natural language processing and computer vision applications
principle: Utilizes various Transformer architectures such as BERT, GPT, and Vision Transformers to perform tasks like text generation, image classification, and more
reusability: Offers modular Jupyter Notebooks and Python scripts that can be easily adapted for different Transformer models and tasks, with API support for model deployment
limitations: Requires substantial computational resources for training large models, may have compatibility issues with older hardware
name: Transformers-for-NLP-and-Computer-Vision-3rd-Edition
highlight: Integrates state-of-the-art Transformer models for both NLP and Computer Vision tasks in a cohesive framework
